verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his flesh <S%H1320><s%> a rising, <S%H7613><s%> a scab, <S%H5597><s%> or <S%H176><s%> bright spot, <S%H934><s%> and it be <S%H1961><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his flesh <S%H1320><s%> like the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy; <S%H6883><s%> then he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> or <S%H176><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his sons <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> the priests: <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the flesh: <S%H1320><s%> and when the hair <S%H8181><s%> in the plague <S%H5061><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and the plague <S%H5061><s%> in sight <S%H4758><s%> be deeper <S%H6013><s%> than the skin <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5785><s%> of his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy: <S%H6883><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> him, and pronounce him unclean. <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the bright spot <S%H934><s%> be white <S%H3836><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and in sight <S%H4758><s%> be not <S%H369><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the hair <S%H8181><s%> thereof be not <S%H3808><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut up <S%H5462><s%> him that hath <S%H853><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> him the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%> be at a stay, <S%H5975><s%> and the plague <S%H5061><s%> spread <S%H6581><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the skin; <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut him up <S%H5462><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> more: <S%H8145><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> him again <S%H8145><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> be somewhat dark, <S%H3544><s%> and the plague <S%H5061><s%> spread <S%H6581><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean: <S%H2891><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is but a scab: <S%H4556><s%> and he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the scab <S%H4556><s%> spread much abroad <S%H6581><s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> after that <S%H310><s%> he hath been seen <S%H7200><s%> of <S%H413><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> for his cleansing, <S%H2893><s%> he shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> of <S%H413><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> again: <S%H8145><s%>

And if the priest <S%H3548><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the scab <S%H4556><s%> spreadeth <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> in a man, <S%H120><s%> then he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest; <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> him: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the rising <S%H7613><s%> be white <S%H3836><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> have turned <S%H2015><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and there be quick <S%H4241><s%> raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the rising; <S%H7613><s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> is an old <S%H3462><s%> leprosy <S%H6883><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean, <S%H2930><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> shut him up: <S%H5462><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> a leprosy <S%H6883><s%> break out abroad <S%H6524><s%> <S%H6524><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> of him that hath the plague <S%H5061><s%> from his head <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> his foot, <S%H7272><s%> wheresoever <S%H3605><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> looketh; <S%H4758><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall consider: <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> have covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> he shall pronounce him clean <S%H2891><s%> that hath <S%H853><s%> the plague: <S%H5061><s%> it is all <S%H3605><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> white: <S%H3836><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
But when <S%H3117><s%> raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> appeareth <S%H7200><s%> in him, he shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and pronounce him to be unclean: <S%H2930><s%> for the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is unclean: <S%H2931><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> turn again, <S%H7725><s%> and be changed <S%H2015><s%> unto white, <S%H3836><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest; <S%H3548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> him: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the plague <S%H5061><s%> be turned <S%H2015><s%> into white; <S%H3836><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean <S%H2891><s%> that hath <S%H853><s%> the plague: <S%H5061><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
The flesh <S%H1320><s%> also, in which, even in the skin <S%H5785><s%> thereof, was <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1961><s%> a boil, <S%H7822><s%> and is healed, <S%H7495><s%>

And in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the boil <S%H7822><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> a white <S%H3836><s%> rising, <S%H7613><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a bright spot, <S%H934><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and somewhat reddish, <S%H125><s%> and it be showed <S%H7200><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the priest; <S%H3548><s%>

And if, when the priest <S%H3548><s%> seeth <S%H7200><s%> it, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it be in sight <S%H4758><s%> lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the hair <S%H8181><s%> thereof be turned <S%H2015><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> broken out <S%H6524><s%> of the boil. <S%H7822><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> look on <S%H7200><s%> it, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there be no <S%H369><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> hairs <S%H8181><s%> therein, and if it be not <S%H369><s%> lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> but be somewhat dark; <S%H3544><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut him up <S%H5462><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it spread much abroad <S%H6581><s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a plague. <S%H5061><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the bright spot <S%H934><s%> stay <S%H5975><s%> in his place, <S%H8478><s%> and spread <S%H6581><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a burning <S%H6867><s%> boil; <S%H7822><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean. <S%H2891><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> any flesh, <S%H1320><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> whereof there is a hot <S%H784><s%> burning, <S%H4348><s%> and the quick <S%H4241><s%> flesh that burneth <S%H4348><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> a white <S%H3836><s%> bright spot, <S%H934><s%> somewhat reddish, <S%H125><s%> or <S%H176><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look upon <S%H7200><s%> it: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the hair <S%H8181><s%> in the bright spot <S%H934><s%> be turned <S%H2015><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and it be in sight <S%H4758><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin; <S%H5785><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a leprosy <S%H6883><s%> broken out <S%H6524><s%> of the burning: <S%H4348><s%> wherefore the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> look on <S%H7200><s%> it, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there be no <S%H369><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> in the bright spot, <S%H934><s%> and it be no <S%H369><s%> lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the other skin, <S%H5785><s%> but be somewhat dark; <S%H3544><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut him up <S%H5462><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look upon <S%H7200><s%> him the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> it be spread much abroad <S%H6581><s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the plague <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the bright spot <S%H934><s%> stay <S%H5975><s%> in his place, <S%H8478><s%> and spread <S%H6581><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> but it <S%H1931><s%> be somewhat dark; <S%H3544><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a rising <S%H7613><s%> of the burning, <S%H4348><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean: <S%H2891><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is an inflammation <S%H6867><s%> of the burning. <S%H4348><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> a plague <S%H5061><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the beard; <S%H2206><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague: <S%H5061><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if it be in sight <S%H4758><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin; <S%H5785><s%> and there be in it a yellow <S%H6669><s%> thin <S%H1851><s%> hair; <S%H8181><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him unclean: <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a dry scurf, <S%H5424><s%> even a leprosy <S%H6883><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> or <S%H176><s%> beard. <S%H2206><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> look on <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of the scurf, <S%H5424><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it be not <S%H369><s%> in sight <S%H4758><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and that there is no <S%H369><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> in it; then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut up <S%H5462><s%> him that hath <S%H853><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of the scurf <S%H5424><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plague: <S%H5061><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the scurf <S%H5424><s%> spread <S%H6581><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> and there be <S%H1961><s%> in it no <S%H3808><s%> yellow <S%H6669><s%> hair, <S%H8181><s%> and the scurf <S%H5424><s%> be not <S%H369><s%> in sight <S%H4758><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin; <S%H5785><s%>

He shall be shaven, <S%H1548><s%> but the scurf <S%H5424><s%> shall he not <S%H3808><s%> shave; <S%H1548><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall shut up <S%H5462><s%> him that hath <S%H853><s%> the scurf <S%H5424><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> more: <S%H8145><s%>

And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the scurf: <S%H5424><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the scurf <S%H5424><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> spread <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> be in sight <S%H4758><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin; <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean: <S%H2891><s%> <S%H853><s%> and he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be clean. <S%H2891><s%>
But if <S%H518><s%> the scurf <S%H5424><s%> spread much <S%H6581><s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his cleansing; <S%H2893><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look on <S%H7200><s%> him: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the scurf <S%H5424><s%> be spread <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> seek <S%H1239><s%> for yellow <S%H6669><s%> hair; <S%H8181><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the scurf <S%H5424><s%> be in his sight <S%H5869><s%> at a stay, <S%H5975><s%> and that there is black <S%H7838><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> grown up <S%H6779><s%> therein; the scurf <S%H5424><s%> is healed, <S%H7495><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is clean: <S%H2889><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him clean. <S%H2891><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> also or <S%H176><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> bright spots, <S%H934><s%> even white <S%H3836><s%> bright spots; <S%H934><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look: <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the bright spots <S%H934><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of their flesh <S%H1320><s%> be darkish <S%H3544><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a freckled spot <S%H933><s%> that groweth <S%H6524><s%> in the skin; <S%H5785><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
And the man <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H3588><s%> hair is fallen off <S%H4803><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is bald; <S%H7142><s%> yet is he <S%H1931><s%> clean. <S%H2889><s%>

And he that hath his hair fallen off <S%H4803><s%> from the part <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6285><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> toward his face, <S%H6440><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is forehead bald: <S%H1371><s%> yet is he <S%H1931><s%> clean. <S%H2889><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> in the bald head, <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> bald forehead, <S%H1372><s%> a white <S%H3836><s%> reddish <S%H125><s%> sore; <S%H5061><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a leprosy <S%H6883><s%> sprung up <S%H6524><s%> in his bald head, <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his bald forehead. <S%H1372><s%>

Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look upon <S%H7200><s%> it: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> if the rising <S%H7613><s%> of the sore <S%H5061><s%> be white <S%H3836><s%> reddish <S%H125><s%> in his bald head, <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in his bald forehead, <S%H1372><s%> as the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> appeareth <S%H4758><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the flesh; <S%H1320><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> is a leprous <S%H6879><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean: <S%H2931><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce him utterly unclean; <S%H2930><s%> <S%H2930><s%> his plague <S%H5061><s%> is in his head. <S%H7218><s%>
